page.title: 09INFLUENCES:AIRFIELD,QUINTON
page.content: Although highly{controversial}in many ways, there is no doubt that the {airfield at Long Marston,}and other military air bases ,affects the lives of the inhabitants of Quinton. Pre-war farmland, Long Marston airfield was created for military use and has only partially returned to its former use as a farm. Nowadays,{activities on the airfield include some light industry ( pallet making and aircraft assembly and repair) as well as microlighting, parachuting, drag-racing,& gliding.Car boot fairs,steam traction and caravan rallies add to the activities.Amidst this, sheep graze and crops grow. Meanwhile,{military aircraft}from bases further afield, seem to compete in getting as close as possible to Meon Hill without denting it.
